resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76614</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76614</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>eeee1234-1234-1fff-ffff-ffff00050287#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Web Gallery of Art - európai festészet és szobrászat a középkortól a barokkig</string>
            <string language="en">Web Gallery of Art - European painting and sculpture from the Middle Ages to the Baroque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Web-Galerie der kunst - europäischer Anstrich 
und Skulptur vom Mitte Alter zum Barock</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galerie de Web d'art - peinture et 
sculpture européennes des âges de milieu au baroque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galeria do Web da arte - pintura e sculpture 
europeus das idades do meio ao baroque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galleria di Web di arte - pittura e scultura 
europee da di Medio Evo al baroque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοά Ιστού της τέχνης - ευρωπαϊκή ζωγραφική και 
γλυπτό από τις μέσες ηλικίες στις μπαρόκ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Galería del Web del arte - pintura y 
escultura europeas de las edades del centro al Barroco</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Bábel tornyához kapcsolódó bibliai történetre utalva a bailoni toronytemplom sematikus rajza összeáll, majd darabokra esik szét.</string>
            <string language="en">Referring to the Biblical story of the tower in Babel, the rough sketch of the Babel tower-temple unites, then it falls apart to parts.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ókor,   ókori,   tornytemplom,   zikkurat,   Babilon,   babiloni,   Marduk,   szentély,   templom,  </string>
            <string language="en">antiquity, antique, tower church, zikkura, Babilon, babylonian, Marduk, shrine, church 


</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf die biblische Geschichte des Aufsatzes in 
Babel bezugnehmend, vereinigt die rauhe Skizze des Babel 
Aufsatz-Bügels, dann fällt sie auseinander auf Teile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En référence à l'histoire biblique de la tour 
à Babel, le croquis approximatif du tour-temple de Babel unit, puis 
il tombe en morceaux aux pièces.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Consultando à história biblical da torre em 
Babel, o esboço áspero do torre-tower-temple de Babel une-se, então
ele cai distante às peças.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riferendosi alla storia biblica della torretta a 
Babele, l'abbozzo approssimativo del torretta-tempiale de Babele 
unisce, quindi cade a parte alle parti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναφερόμενο στη βιβλική ιστορία του πύργου στη Βαβέλ,
το τραχύ σκίτσο του πύργος-ναού της Βαβέλ ενώνει, κατόπιν 
καταρρέει στα μέρη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refiriendo a la historia bíblica de la torre en 
Babel, el bosquejo áspero del torre-templo de Babel une, después 
baja aparte a las piezas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Altertum, Antike, Aufsatzkirche, zikkura, Babilon, Babylonian, 
Marduk, Schrein, Kirche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">antiquité, antiquité, église de tour, zikkura, Babilon, 
Babylonien, Marduk, tombeau, église</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">antiquity, antique, igreja da torre, zikkura, Babilon, 
babylonian, Marduk, shrine, igreja</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">antichità, oggetto d'antiquariato, chiesa della torretta, 
zikkura, Babilon, babylonian, Marduk, shrine, chiesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαιότητα, αντίκα, εκκλησία πύργων, zikkura, Babilon,
babylonian, Marduk, η λάρνακα, εκκλησία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">antigüedad, antigüedad, iglesia de la torre, zikkura, Babilon,
babilónico, Marduk, capilla, iglesia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
